titles.title: Healthy Families Act of 2014
A bill to make the United States Preventive Services Task Force subject to the Federal Advisory Committee Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 7/9/2014--Introduced. Healthy Families Act of 2014 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to make the United States Preventive Services Task Force subject to Federal Advisory Committee Act requirements, including open meetings.
